name: Blagothkus

trait.name: Keen Smell
text: Blagothkus has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
text: Blagothkus can innately cast the following spells (spell save DC 15), requiring no material components:

trait.name: Spellcasting
text: Blagothkus is a 5th-level spellcaster that uses Intelligence as his spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). Blagothkus has the following spells prepared from the wizard spell list:
Cantrips (at will): light, mage hand, prestidigitation
• 1st level (4 slots): detect magic, identify, magic missile, shield
• 2nd level (3 slots): gust of wind, misty step, shatter

action.name: Multiattack
text: Blagothkus attacks twice with his morningstar.

action.name: Morningstar
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 21 (3d8 + 8) piercing damage.

spells: fog cloud, levitate, light, mage hand, prestidigitation, detect magic, identify, magic missile, shield, gust of wind, misty step, shatter, fly, lightning bolt
description: Source: Hoard of the Dragon Queen p. 89
